relation: Great for these types of students
Security guards patrol the campus all day and there are always people nearby.
Clubs for a variety of interests are available; some even offer college credit!
Great for students with a lack of funds or students that are undecided. The college is also great for working people.
The college is very affordable and provides high-quality education that can fit into any schedule.
A student lounge is available with modern gaming systems, a pool table, a large TV, and a cafeteria. The campus hosts a large library, and a low-commitment community orchestra plays year-round.
A bookstore is on campus with snacks and soups available. Students can also visit a reasonably-priced cafeteria located in the student lounge.
Brevard Community College is very flexible in its academics. Students can progress slowly through courses or speed through them, and the courses run a variety of difficulties.
Register for classes early, buy books early, and get to know the campus before classes start.

Brevard Community College is an excellent jumping off point for anyone pursuing higher education. Classes consist of high school students, fresh graduates, and people who have been in the professional world for years already. A single semester leaves students feeling more confident about school and builds new contacts for the future.
pageTitle: Eastern Florida State College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {220818=Do your research! Don't just jump into something thinking it will be fun. I did that right out of high school, I graduated in 2006. Now I'm still going to college. Be sure to take your time, there's no rush!, 573545=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 473147=Eastern Florida State is a very safe campus. I have been attending since 2004 and have never come across any issues. The security team really keeps up with what needs to be done., 392949=Brevard Community College is a great school. The science department taught by Dr. James Yount is especially great. I attend the Titusville campus and will be attending the Cocoa campus in the fall of 2013. I am consistently surprised at the quality that this school provides. I am grateful to call it MY school.}

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students BCC is great for students that are still trying to figure out what they want to do with their life. I was on the fence my ehole high school career, and BCC really helped me pinpoint what I love to do, and what I'm best at, which is Writing. Tips for prospective students Apply as soon as you can! It is important to meet with an advisor so that he or she can get you on the right track. Be sure to only take on what you can handle. I started out with only taking 4 classes and now I'm ready to take on 5 this semester.
